The expert analyzed statements made by R: S. Sen. Joni Ernst during televised debates, specifically regarding her stance on residency, legal status, or citizenship for Dreamers.
The expert examined Ernst: s voting record and statements made during her 2014 campaign for the Senate seat, as well as her performance in debates with her then-challenger, Democrat Bruce Braley.
